publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4222 Mr Tom McCabe: Local Electoral Administration and Registration Services (Scotland) Bill: Financial Resolution—That the Parliament, for the purposes of any Act of the Scottish Parliament resulting from the Local Electoral Administration and Registration Services (Scotland) Bill, agrees to— (a) any increase in expenditure of a kind referred to in paragraph 3(b)(iii) of Rule 9.12 of the Parliament’s Standing Orders; and (b) any charges or payments in relation to which paragraph 4 of that Rule applies, arising in consequence of the Act.

S2M-4222 Mr Tom McCabe: Local Electoral Administration and Registration Services (Scotland) Bill: Financial Resolution—That the Parliament, for the purposes of any Act of the Scottish Parliament resulting from the Local Electoral Administration and Registration Services (Scotland) Bill, agrees to— (a) any increase in expenditure of a kind referred to in paragraph 3(b)(iii) of Rule 9.12 of the Parliament’s Standing Orders; and (b) any charges or payments in relation to which paragraph 4 of that Rule applies, arising in consequence of the Act.
